title: Problems with this "New and Improved" Client
body: I went into draft normal champion select, after finally getting through to where the game was about to load, the load screen never showed up. Its stayed on the regular clients page with one button that said (Reconnect to game). I tried that but all it does is just flash the screen a little bit and refuse to put me back into the game. I do not know why its doing this but i cannot rejoin the game and now i'm going to be put in the leaver buster system because of something that i have no control over. I have to wait in like a 30 min Queue for five game because you guys want to "improve" something that was already fine. PLEASE HELP, I DO NOT WANT TO BE PUNISHED FOR SOMETHING I DID NOT DO.

replies.body: Sorry for the issues you've been having here.  :(  This doesn't sound client related because you've already completed champion select and transitioning to the game itself.  The issue may be stemming form a network problem that's failing to reach the game server.  You'll want to stick to customs for now and run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix that up.
